author: Owen Phillips
description: The best way to beat LeBron James is to hope he stays home, and he never stays home.
title: LeBron James Is Indestructible

author: Michael Singer
description: LeBron James passed Michael Jordan as the all-time playoff scoring leader but is determined not to define his career by comparisons to the legend.
title: LeBron James seeks his own legacy in face of Michael Jordan comparison
